textAfterTable: TAR_PAX = 3 PAX tar archive. TAR_USTAR = 2 USTAR tar archive. TAR_V7 = 1 Tar version 7 archive. ZIP = 10 ZIP archive. Member Variables protected bool $completed = false Is true when the archive is read until the end, otherwise false. protected array(ezcArchiveEntry) $entries Stores the entries read from the archive. The array is not complete when the $completed variable is set to false. The array may be over-complete, so the $entriesRead should be checked if the $completed variable is set to true. protected int $entriesRead = 0 The number of entries currently
